title: description
Mario's Let Hurricane Love You: A worth mix between the Hurricane Cocktail 2 and the Hong Kong Cocktail Variation. As full as Mario's hand.

title: notes
Mario's Let Hurricane Love You: Gin, Rye and a hint of makeup.

title: pairing
Mario's Let Hurricane Love You: Mario has it with a full Pink Lady and kouign-amann.

title: serving_suggestion
Mario's Let Hurricane Love You: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the bad sounds of Let Me Love You.
